songs.title: Nobody’s Perfect
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Cool, I am, when I am with you
Cool, I'm not, when I am lonely

[Verse 1]
I feel so sad, what I did wasn't right
I feel so bad, and I must say to you
Sorry, but...

[Chorus 1]
Nobody's perfect
Nobody's perfect
What did you expect?
I'm doing my best

[Verse 2]
I feel so sad, but you know I'll be true
I feel so bad, and I must say to you
Sorry, but

[Chorus 2]
Nobody's perfect
Nobody's perfect
What did you expect?
I'm doing my best
Nobody's perfect
Nobody's perfect
I was dishonest
I will do my best, yeah

[Breakdown]
Cool, I am, when I am with you
Cool, I'm not, when I am lonely

[Chorus 2]
Nobody's perfect
Nobody's perfect
What did you expect?
I'm doing my best
Nobody's perfect
Nobody's perfect
I was dishonest
I will do my best, yeah

[Outro]
Mmm mmm, yeah
Mmm mmm, yeah
Perfect, perfect, perfect, perfect...
